parameters.ccfpday: average gas usage per day (Utilities2 only)
parameters.elecbillpday:
electric bill divided by billing days a numeric vector
(Utilities2 only)
parameters.billingDays: number of billing days in billing period
parameters.gasbillpday: gas bill divided by billing days (Utilities2 only)
parameters.day: day of month on which bill was calculated
parameters.kwhpday: average electric usage per day (Utilities2 only)
parameters.totalbillpday:
total bill divided by billing days a
numeric vector (Utilities2 only)

reference: Daniel T. Kaplan, Statistical modeling: A fresh approach, 2009.
description:
Description
Data from utility bills at a private residence.  This is an augmented version
of Utilities.
title: Utility bills
format: A data frame containing 117 observations for the following variables.
